title: Philippines - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Philippines stands at BBB+ with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Philippines was last set at Baa2 with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Philippines was last reported at BBB with negative outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Philippines thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Philippines as reported by major credit rating agencies.
